Thanks to my PA colleague @RepSusanWild for working together on this important bipartisan amendment #CAPTA
Children rely upon all adults to report it if they suspect neglect or abuse. No adult should allow abuse to go unreported, and we all have an equal duty to help protect children. #CAPTA @EdLaborGOP

The amendment I’m proposing with @RepSusanWild directs @HHSGov to study trends in referrals and investigations of child abuse and neglect in states with different requirements for mandatory reporting #CAPTA
#CAPTA is a critical law that provides essential support for state child protective service systems and programs to help communities fight against child abuse and neglect @EdLaborGOP
